name: HuntVR
description:
HuntVR was created for VR Austin Jam 2016

by Taco Illuminati (Jacob Sawyer, Saam Pahlavan, Damon Chandler)

Requirements:

  • HTC Vive
  • Contempt for cute forest critters

Controls:

  • Bow - Use trigger to pull arrow from behind head
  • Right hand - Use trigger to pick up objects
  • Movement - Press & hold touchpad to open view, extend hand out towards view to move forward, release to transport.
  • Restart - Press R
